SmartFieldSpec.Name: Greatest Need Smart Field 2
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Used in the standard Greatest Need rule set for child sponsorship programs
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_SPONSORSHIPOPPOTUNITYCHILDGREATESTNEED2 ( @ASOF datetime ) as begin -- case [STATUSCODE] when (0) then N'Pending' when (1) then N'Active' when (2) then N'Inactive' end)
-- New kids not sponsored select so.ID, (DATEDIFF (m,so.dateadded, getdate()) + 1) * 2 as PRIORITY from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.id where not exists (select ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID)
union all
-- Formerly Sponsored children - this get a slightly higher priority than new children select so.ID, ((DATEDIFF (m,max (sp1.ENDDATE), getdate()) + 1) * 2) + 1 as PRIORITY from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.id inner join SPONSORSHIP sp1 on sp1.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID where exists (select ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP sp2 where sp2.[STATUSCODE] = 2 and sponsorshipopportunityid = so.ID) and not exists (select ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP sp2 where sp2.[STATUSCODE] in (0, 1) and sponsorshipopportunityid = so.ID)
group by so.ID
end
